blog.name: n-chu4ever

blog.description:
N-Chu is here! Welcome to the shitshow!

Various fandoms, former RPer, Christian disaster, gonna write a space novel!

The banner and icon aren’t mine it was done for me by blackwingripclaw! :D

body:
another Thing

I don’t hate Rose in Last Jedi. Yes, she’s a little annoying. But I don’t hate her.

Why?

BECAUSE SHE LOST HER SISTER AND SHES STILL A BIT SNARKY DESPITE IT

Yes, she ends up with a failed plot. Guess what: That’s normal for real life. Like every other Star Wars plot seems to churn out ‘YAYA SUCCESS’ over and over! WTF? WHERES THE FAILURE

(For heroes, not villains)

Also she’s kind of a badass?

Also isn’t the whole movie kinda full of failures anyway?

- Rey fails to turn Kylo away from the darkness

- Rose and Finn and Poe fail in their kind of ridiculous plan (I wouldn’t rest a plan on that luck guys)

- Snoke fails to turn and kill Rey bc KYLO KILLS HIM

- Aaaand Luke fails to keep Rey and Kylo separate I’m kinda glad he died tbh bc ITS TIME TO STOP OLD MAN

Can Anakin pls just come and yell at everyone pls? Yell at Luke’s ghost, yell at Kylo (“JUST GO AND BECOME GREYS WITH REY OMG JUST HAVE BABIES ALREADY YOUR MOTHER AND GRANDMOTHER ARE DISAPPOINTED”)

Also Kelly Marie Tran is FAB and should not have been bullied off of social media

This is why I’m a TAG fan first

blog.name: bentarb
blog.title: honor is a fool's prize, glory is of no use to the dead.

title: Sith, Princess’s, and Werewolves
body:
Last night I had a dream combineing Star Wars: The Old Rebuplic, Werewolves, Politics, and Romance.

What was going on was I was Sith Lord, Darth Fenrir, The Emperor’s Wrath, and the only Sith to gain the gift of lycanthropy. I was on Alderaan going through some museum and ran into Dark Council member Dart Marr. I went over to say hello and learned I was in a relationship with a Princess of Alderaan. (Not Leia before anyone asks, this was three thousand years before she was born). But for reasons unknowen this was apprarently frowned upon and had to be kept secret.

I’m still trying to work out why.

tags: Star Wars Conversations ep 64 Force Ghost Frankie
summary: Star Wars Conversations ep 64 Force Ghost Frankie
title: Star Wars Conversations ep 64 Force Ghost Frankie
body:
Star Wars Conversations ep 64 Force Ghost Frankie

In our 64th Episode, two scruffy looking nerf herders discuss:

– Announcement – Force Ghost Frank new moderator

– Lucasfilm Was Reportedly Developing A STAR WARS Spinoff Set In The Mos Eisley Spacesport

– Rian Johnson trilogy could be coming as soon as 2020

– How do we keep Star Wars special?

There are so many films, books, comics and tv shows happening so quickly that Star Wars no longer feels…

View On WordPress

summary: Harry Potter and the Pie Maker
title: Harry Potter and the Pie Maker
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2tNBVCd

by salampsio

I’ve always wondered what the deal was with Ned. Is he the only one of his kind? Is he a wizard that just never received an invitation to a wizarding school? This whole story came to me all at once one day while I was in my car, and in this rare instance, I actually wrote down the idea. It took me a few years to actually write it, though.

This is primarily a Harry Potter - Pushing Daisies cross over, but there’s a couple of Jedi who make brief appearances, and Doctor Who also makes an appearance to help me move the plot along. Basically, Hermione wants to go to an American university to get away for a while and to explore her muggle roots. Ron goes with her. They run into Chuck’s father who discovers that they are witches. Charles Charles thinks the witches might be able to solve the riddle that is Ned and save Chuck’s life, too, so he tries to get them together. I don’t know how to tell you much more without there being spoilers. I will say that there is a meeting, and that the wizards think they can help Ned, and Ned thinks he can help Harry. In the process, interesting things happen.

Words: 1296, Chapters: 2/22, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling, Pushing Daisies, Star Wars - All Media Types, Doctor Who
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Characters: Ned (Pushing Daisies), Charlotte “Chuck” Charles, Ron Weasley, Hermione Granger


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2tNBVCd

blog.name: nobodysuspectsthebutterfly
blog.title: Nobody ever suspects the butterfly...
blog.description:
Hey, you can call me Mindset, or Butterfly.
I like: Comics, ASOIAF, music, art, books, sf & fantasy, butterflies, birds, pretty rocks, and many other things. See my sidebar tags and links for more details.
I help mod: ASOIAF University and A Song of Theories.
Note to ASOIAF fandom followers: I've read all the books, and rarely if ever cut for spoilers, sorry. Please check my FAQ and the other links on my sidebar for more info.

tags: one does not acquire 50+ appreciative posts on their blog about a subject if one does not care for that subject
also anon who cares if you're a minority!
if you love it find people who love it!
if you hate it there's plenty out there too!
i'm not saying you should echo chamber yourself but fellow travelers are not hard to find

summary: Anytime I had a problem, and I threw a Molotov cocktail… boom! Right away, I had a different problem.
text: Anytime I had a problem, and I threw a Molotov cocktail… boom! Right away, I had a different problem.

blog.name: mandowords
blog.title: Miit'alor
blog.description: I am a descriptivist linguist for the Mando'a language. I show what it can do, not what it MUST do. This is a place for discussion about Mando'a, and Mandalorian society and culture. Feel free to use the head cannons from this blog (or reblogged from others) in your RP or writing. All words and descriptions are taken from the mandoa.org Mandalorian Dictionary. Want to support this blog? Buy me a Kofi? OR buy some Mando'a themed items? Visit our Discord? Blog icon by Rina
